name: Missile Command (itch)
description:
Context

3 air defense bases. 6 cities.

Your objective is to survive as long as you can.

Controls

[Mouse Move] to aim.

[Mouse Click] to shoot from nearest base.

[Arrow Keys] to shoot from:

        [Left] - Alpha base

        [Up] or [Down] - Delta base

        [Right] - Omega base

[Space] to pause.

[Esc] to exit.
